info.longBusinessSummary: MatsukiyoCocokara & Co. operates and manages chain stores, drug stores, and insurance dispensing pharmacies in Japan. The company is involved in the franchise business development and product supply to franchisees. It offers its products under the nake and RECiPEO brand names. MatsukiyoCocokara & Co. was founded in 1932 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
